public class KifImplication
extends KifLogSent
The class for KifImplication, a type of KIF logical sentence.

Author:
Xiaocheng Luan

KifImplication 
 public KifImplication(KifSent conSent,
                       KifSeq anteSeq)
Create a KifImplication object with given antecedent and consequence.

Parameters:
conSent - the consequence sentence.
anteSeq - the sequence of antecedent sentences.
KifImplication 
 public KifImplication(KifSent conSent)
Create a KifImplication object with given antecedent and consequence. of the forms (=> sentence) or (<= sentence). The KIF specification for this logical implication is ambigious, Thus this constructor may be changed or even dropped later.

Parameters:
conSent - the consequence sentence.

antecedenceSeq 
 public KifSeq antecedenceSeq()
Get the sequence of antecedent sentences.

Returns:
the sequence of antecedent sentences.
consequenceSent 
 public KifSent consequenceSent()
Get the consequence sentence.

Returns:
the consequence sentence.
toString

this KIF sentence in String format.
